website_summaries.verdict: The Asus Transformer Book Flip TP200SA is a versatile convertible-hybrid laptop with a sturdy design and solid port options.
pros: Good port selection, including a USB-C port
Almost 12 hours of battery life in testing
cons: Display backlight is a little dim

customer_reviews.title: This is a good laptop, but first time upgrading windows 10
customer_reviews.text: This is a good laptop, but first time upgrading windows 10, it failed and now is a loop and is rebooting with Asus followed by trying to restoring previous version of windows, then just rebooting. And now I am told that this cannot be return after only having it for One mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret L Wigley

customer_reviews.title: This is an extremely good but cheap touchscreen laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely good but cheap touchscreen laptop. My daughter uses it for homework and uses cloud to store documents as the storage capacity on this is small but for the money, what do you expect. Great laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Peter Tanner

customer_reviews.title: i was interested to try Win 10 but this laptop ...
customer_reviews.text: i was interested to try Win 10 but this laptop does not have the power to do anything meaningful. Surfing the Web is OK but it doesn't have memory to do much else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer DCM

customer_reviews.title: Very bad performance and too short battery life
customer_reviews.text: Very bad performance and too short battery life. However handy and fits into suitcases and other bags without a problem. If you're not looking for anything great, this is what you want. If you are though this is not suited for you at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great size, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous, great size, easy to use. Bought as Xmas present for techy 11 year old, well impressed with touchscreen x
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a plty
customer_reviews.text: Impressive Nice feeling How ever during setting (which is quite easy) received message "closing down" which it does. Found unable no matter what to rest Regrettably had to return for refund.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: now its useless after using it for a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: The background light died after a half year, the memory is too small, now its useless after using it for a couple of months...
customer_reviews.author: ❤

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter very happy with hers, not had any issues and a nice compact little laptop
customer_reviews.author: CrombieScotland

customer_reviews.title: Machine is great but tricky to do upgrades
customer_reviews.text: Nice look and feel but absolutely no space on the machine making upgrades tricky.
customer_reviews.author: mary round

customer_reviews.title: What can I say love it, taking me a while to a just ...
customer_reviews.text: Well Well Well !!! What can I say love it, taking me a while to a just to Windows 10 but in awe. A must have, its silent running which to me is a must it doesn't get hot in one corner. Battery life good been using all morning and still 3/4 available. It will take a while to get used to but worth every penny. Buy and see and colour is great.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Terrible laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely rubbish. So glad we were able to return this. After you install windows 10 you only have 4gb hdd space which is totally useless. Such a shame as with more hdd space this would be a very good laptop. Still a very basic laptop but would have been fit for purpose if there was room on the hdd.
customer_reviews.author: Emjay

customer_reviews.title: Very good Linux machine
customer_reviews.text: The pre-installed Windows 10 didn't want to let me install a dual-boot system, so I've no idea what that would have been like. It makes an excellent little Linux machine, though, and that's what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: ian wild

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, handy and with excellent battery life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop as I needed something smaller than my 15 inch laptop to carry around. This notebook is of a handy size, big enough to be able to read documents and browse the internet normally and small enough to be taken anywhere with me. It is also very light and as such easy to carry around. It also looks good and is well-built. The battery lasted 8-10 hours on average so far. Do bear in mind that it only had 2GB RAM, which is enough for everyday use, but not for heavy multitasking or gaming. All in all, it is what I was expecting and looking for.
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: Good for Light tasks, check if it suits your needs
customer_reviews.text: Nice little laplet, especally witht the 64 bit archutecture. This is perfect for bringing around and an handy device for light research or entertainment (I stream or turn on podcasts while working). The space is a bit of an issue or annoyance but I knew that coming in, consider a sd card pretty quickly. This is for light tasks and lacks the power of a laptop. The style is nice and design works pretty well, battery lasts long but I don't really strain it too much. This is used in conjunction with my more powerful conventional laptop, and I douth if one could solely convert to this machine.
customer_reviews.author: C Laufeyson

customer_reviews.title: Bought as Christmas pressy and it does everything as expected ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as Christmas pressy and it does everything as expected, also realised that it is touch screen as well so added bonus. Top value.
customer_reviews.author: martin cross

customer_reviews.title: It's OK but not great. But you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It's OK but not great. But you get what you pay for. The touch screen is not so sensitive as an ipad and I'm finding I use the finger pad mostly. The operation system tends to be slow. Bought to take on holiday as I take a lot of photos and my camera can download straight into it (unlike my ipad). I've loaded it up with some films to watch. Nevertheless a good buy and useful second computer.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Cowling

customer_reviews.title: This is a great idea and the screen is good and in tablet ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea and the screen is good and in tablet mode feels good in the hand but that it where it stops. It comes cluttered with preloaded software which reduces you minimal storage even further. The 64bit operating system is slow with only 2GB RAM. The preloaded operating system (Windows 10 Home) can not even find the camera. I tried contacting ASUS but no chance, no support, no answer,nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for browsing the Web only as you can't install ...
customer_reviews.text: The screen is too much too see. But totally noiseless. And dead light - if you are getting the version that you need to update to Windows 10 - be careful and it has not got enough storage capacity and it will fail to do so. Good for browsing the Web only as you can't install Office etc - no room in the storage media.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

product_meta.title: ASUS TP200SA 11.6-Inch Touch screen, 360 degree rotatable notebook - Intel Celeron N3050 1.6 GHz Processor, 2 GB RAM, 32 GB eMMC, Integrated Graphics, Windows 10
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:SilverBy carefully trimming every last piece of excess weight, the TP200 is the lightest Asus Flip ever. Thin, light, compact, and stylish, the TP200 is the perfect take-anywhere device that's ready to go wherever your day takes you. It's always to hand for work, for sharing or for simply relaxing. The Flip TP200's gorgeous metal finish makes it lovely to touch, and its stylish looks make it stand out from the crowd. But Flip TP200 doesn't just look and feel good; the scratch-resistant texture is amazingly tough and durable too, helping to keep its elegant beauty unblemished.

Flip TP200's robust and remarkable 360, multi-gear metal hinge gives you the freedom to organise your life the way you want. Do serious work in laptop mode. Flip into tent mode to share or discuss stuff with your colleagues. Create your own personal movie theatre in an instant with stand mode. And wherever you are, Flip's handy tablet mode is enhanced by the lightweight design and superb battery life.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Asus Notebook
Battery
AC Adapter
User Documentation/Media
feature_bullets: Expressive elegance - Flip TP200's gorgeous metal finish makes it lovely to touch, and its stylish looks make it stand out from the crowd

Solid engineering from any angle - the robust 360 multi-gear metal hinge gives you the freedom to organise your life the way you want. Do serious work in laptop mode, flip into tent mode to share or discuss stuff with your colleagues, and create your own personal movie theater in an instant with stand mode
A responsive touchpad that's smart - the large touchpad makes it effortless to navigate your way around Windows, and is a perfect balance between sensitivity and usability

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars26 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
